title: Rowdy Rathore
short_cast: Akshay Kumar, Sonakshi Sinha, Nassar, Yashpal Sharma, Paresh Ganatra, Gurdip Kohli, Mushtaq Khan, Amit Kumar Tiwari
cast: Akshay Kumar, Sonakshi Sinha, Nassar, Yashpal Sharma, Paresh Ganatra, Gurdip Kohli, Mushtaq Khan, Amit Kumar Tiwari

desc: A con man uncovers a deadly secret and must save his lady love, the little girl who insists she's his daughter and the small-town locals from the mob.
